description: The Department of National Defence, Garrison (Grn) Petawawa wishes to acquire mattresses and foundations to refurnish the accommodations buildings throughout Garrison Petawawa. Supports required documents, bids must be submitted by February 7, 2023, by 2:00 pm EST, Any bids submitted after this time, will result in the bid being declared Non Responsive.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

# W0107-23JW10 Mattresses and Foundations
-----------------------------------------

The King's Ship-Assets Canada (modernized Public Works and Government Services Canada) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide mattresses and foundations for refurnishing accommodations buildings throughout Garrison Petawawa.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3816683996-Doc3836661797
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3816683996
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services - GD
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Tendering
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 9, 2023
* **Regions of Delivery**: Petawawa

## Description
---------------

The Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison (Grn) Petawawa, is seeking to procure mattresses and foundations for refurnishing accommodations buildings throughout Garrison Petawawa.

## Notice of Extension
-----------------------

Please note that the original tender closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time have been modified. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 EST on February 7, 2023.

## Supporting Documents
----------------------

* The tender package can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15187044?extsite=MTUxODcwNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15187044?extsite=MTUxODcwNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Contact Information
----------------------

For further information, please contact Fraser, Alexa at:

* Email: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: All offices and contact information have been excluded as they were not relevant to the announcement. Any additional data needed to be collected which you can find on the ariba website for the given notice. Please ensure to check Ariba/SupplyCanada website for any ongoing bids, future announcements, and/or used Ariba notices: [https://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/index.asp?id=30000000116598#media=search&search Id=30000000116598](https
